meta.title: kulupu lipu Stoic Wisdom Series — toki pona
meta.description: lipu pi sona stoic li kama sin lon toki pona — sitelen pona li lon poka toki pona. lipu pi mani ala (Reader’s Kit) li lon kin — en lipu ante pi toki pona tan jan sama.

hero.title: sona stoic lon toki pona
hero.subtitle: lipu pi sona stoic li kama sin lon toki pona. nimi lili, sona pona: sitelen pona li lon poka toki pona, la lukin lipu li kama sama pali pi lukin.

why.title: tan seme la kulupu lipu ni li pona?

history.title: toki pi wawa pi sona
history.text: toki pona li wile e ni: sina toki e kon taso. ni li pona tawa nasin stoic: toki lili, nasa lili, sona suli.

style.title: lipu lili, ken lukin lon tenpo ale
style.text: lipu ni li lili li pona tawa pali. sina ken lukin lili lon tenpo suno ale, li kama sin tawa toki wan, li kama sona e ona.

europe.title: sitelen Lasina + sitelen pona
europe.text: toki pona li lon sitelen Lasina, li lon sitelen pona kin. wan li tawa lukin lipu; ante li pana e lukin pi nasin en pi tempo toki.

discovery.title: kulupu wan, nasin wan
discovery.text: kulupu lipu ni li jo e nasin wan: lukin pona, nimi pona, nasin ante ala. sina ken open lon lipu ale, anu o jo e lipu ale sama kulupu wan.

marcus-meditations.title: lipu “Meditations” pi jan Maku — lon toki pona
marcus-meditations.author: jan Maku
marcus-meditations.shortDesc: lipu ni li lipu suli pi nasin stoic.
marcus-meditations.longDesc: toki ona li kama lon toki pona, li lon sitelen Lasina en sitelen pona. sina ken lukin e toki lili lon tenpo suno ale, la pilin en lawa li kama pona.

readers-kit.title: ilo lipu pi toki pona (lipu pi mani ala)
readers-kit.author: ABV en jan Pitakola
readers-kit.shortDesc: lipu ni li pona tawa jan sin.
readers-kit.longDesc: ona li pana e nasin pi lukin lipu lon toki pona, li jo kin e lipu ale pi “The Golden Verses of Pythagoras”. o kama jo e lipu, o kama sona lili, la sina ken tawa lipu pi kulupu ni.

epictetus-enchiridion.title: jan Epiteto: lipu Enkilijon lon toki pona
epictetus-enchiridion.author: jan Epiteto
epictetus-enchiridion.shortDesc: lipu Enkilijon li lipu lili pi sona Sito. ona li pana e nasin pi lawa insa: ijo li lon pali mi, ijo li lon pali ala mi. ona li pona tawa tenpo pi wile mute en tenpo pi pilin pakala.
epictetus-enchiridion.longDesc: lipu Enkilijon li lipu pi nasin pali. lipu lili mute li lon. sina ken lukin e wan, sina awen, sina kepeken sona ona lon tenpo suno. lipu ni li ante e toki pi jan Epiteto kepeken toki pona, tawa ni: lukin li nasa ala, lawa li ken awen. ijo lon lipu ni: toki Inli pi lipu pi jan Elizabeth Carter tawa lukin ante. toki pona lon sitelen Lasina, en toki sama lon sitelen pona. nasin pi lukin lili lon tenpo mute: o lukin e lipu lili, o awen, o pana e sona ona tawa tenpo suno. nasin pona: “toki pona pi lipu ni li wile ni: sina ken lukin e pali wile.” sina ken kama jo e lipu pona pi kama sona, e lipu pi kulupu lipu, lon nimi lon lipu.

seneca-shortness-of-life.title: jan Seneka — lipu pi tenpo lili pi lon — lon toki pona
seneca-shortness-of-life.author: jan Seneka
seneca-shortness-of-life.shortDesc: lipu ni li pana e sona pi tenpo: tenpo li lili ala; mi weka e tenpo mute. lipu ni li pana e nasin pona tawa lawa en pali, li toki e ni: o kama jo sin e tenpo sina — lon toki pona.
seneca-shortness-of-life.longDesc: jan mute li toki e ni: “tenpo mi li lili.” taso jan Seneka li toki wawa: tenpo li lili ala; mi weka e tenpo mute. lipu ni li pana e nasin pona tawa ni: o lukin e weka pi tenpo, o awen e lawa, o kepeken tenpo kepeken wile pona. lipu ni li lon kulupu Stoic Wisdom in Toki Pona. toki Inli li tan lipu pi jan ala. toki pona li pali sin, li pali tawa ni: toki pi jan Seneka li awen wawa, taso toki li awen pona, li awen lili, li awen ken lukin. toki pona lon lipu ni li awen sama lon ijo suli: nimi li awen sama la, sina ken lukin e ijo sama lon tenpo mute. lipu pi nimi pi pana sona li pana e nasin tan kulupu pi toki sama. sina wile open la, lipu “Reader’s Kit” en nasin pi sitelen pona li lon (kepeken nimi pi pana tawa sina).

cicero-on-duties.title: jan Sise: lipu pi pali wile pona lon toki pona; sitelen pona kin
cicero-on-duties.author: jan Sise
cicero-on-duties.shortDesc: lipu ni li pana e nasin pi pali wile pona lon tenpo ale. ona li pana e toki pona en sitelen pona tawa lukin sin, tawa lawa insa pi awen pona.
cicero-on-duties.longDesc: lipu ni li lon kulupu pi sona pona stoika lon toki pona. toki Inli li lon tawa lukin ante; toki pona li pali sin, li awen pona, li awen lili, li awen ken lukin. sitelen pona kin li lon tawa lukin sin, tawa pali pi lawa insa. lipu Book I li pana e open: ona li toki e ni: pali wile pona li seme, ona li kama tan seme, ona li kama nasin pi pali lon tenpo ale. lipu Book II li alasa e pona tawa kulupu lon mani, lon pali, lon nimi, lon pana pona, lon pali pi kulupu. lipu Book III li wile e pona pi awen: pona pi lon ala li ken kama tan pali ike. sina pali ike tawa jan, sina pakala e toki, anu sina pakala e nasin pona sina la, “pona” ni li len taso; ona li kama ike lon tenpo kama tawa sina anu tawa kulupu.

legal.title: lipu lawa
legal.ipValue: lipu en sitelen ale li tan jan lawa anu li jo e wile.
legal.liabilityValue: sona ni li kama sama ni taso.

privacy.title: nasin len
privacy.dataValue: tomo lipu ni li alasa ala e sona pi jan.
privacy.cookiesValue: kuki pi sona lukin ala. taso sitelen tawa YouTube li ken pana e kuki.
privacy.rightsValue: sina wile sona la, o toki tawa mi.
